title.en: There was/were - Past Singular & Plural (Había singular y plural)
title.es: There was/were - Past Singular & Plural (Había singular y plural)

description.en: Learn 'there was' for singular/uncountable nouns and 'there were' for plural nouns in the past. Spanish speakers often miss this distinction since 'había' doesn't change form, but English requires different past forms.
description.es: Aprende 'there was' para sustantivos singulares/incontables y 'there were' para sustantivos plurales en el pasado. Los hispanohablantes a menudo pierden esta distinción ya que 'había' no cambia de forma, pero el inglés requiere formas pasadas diferentes.

prompt.es: Había un moscardón gordo en la pantalla de su ordenador.

exercises.solution: There was a big fat fly on his computer screen.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for singular countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos contables en singular en el pasado.

prompt.es: Había tres mil libras esterlinas sobre la mesa.

exercises.solution: There was three thousand pounds on the table.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for uncountable nouns like money, even with large amounts.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos incontables como dinero, incluso con cantidades grandes.

prompt.es: No había nadie allí.

exercises.solution: There wasn't anybody there.

tip.en: Use 'there wasn't' for negative singular in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there wasn't' para singular negativo en el pasado.

prompt.es: No quedaba té en la tetera.

exercises.solution: There wasn't any tea left in the tea-pot.

tip.en: Use 'there wasn't' for uncountable nouns in negative.
tip.es: Usa 'there wasn't' para sustantivos incontables en negativo.

prompt.es: No había fertilizante en el cobertizo, pero había herbicida.

exercises.solution: There wasn't any fertilizer in the shed, but there was some weed-killer.

tip.en: Use 'there wasn't' and 'there was' for uncountable nouns in past.
tip.es: Usa 'there wasn't' y 'there was' para sustantivos incontables en pasado.

prompt.es: Había tres crías en el nido del águila.

exercises.solution: There were three chicks in the eagle's nest.

tip.en: Use 'there were' for plural countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos contables en plural en el pasado.

prompt.es: No sé si había tanta gente.

exercises.solution: I don't know if there were that many people there.

tip.en: Use 'there were' for plural nouns, even with quantities.
tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos en plural, incluso con cantidades.

prompt.es: Creo que hubo unos contratiempos durante la fase inicial.

exercises.solution: I think there were some setbacks during the initial phase.

tip.en: Use 'there were' for plural countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos contables en plural en el pasado.

prompt.es: Había cincuenta errores en el texto.

exercises.solution: There were fifty mistakes in the text.

tip.en: Use 'there were' for plural countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos contables en plural en el pasado.

prompt.es: Había dos candidatos finalistas para el puesto.

exercises.solution: There were two candidates short-listed for the position.

tip.en: Use 'there were' for plural countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos contables en plural en el pasado.

prompt.es: Había una tormenta terrible anoche.

exercises.solution: There was a terrible storm last night.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for singular countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos contables en singular en el pasado.

prompt.es: No había suficientes sillas para todos.

exercises.solution: There weren't enough chairs for everyone.

tip.en: Use 'there weren't' for plural nouns in negative past.
tip.es: Usa 'there weren't' para sustantivos en plural en pasado negativo.

prompt.es: Había música muy alta en el piso de arriba.

exercises.solution: There was very loud music in the flat upstairs.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for uncountable nouns like music.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos incontables como música.

prompt.es: Había muchos estudiantes en la biblioteca ayer.

exercises.solution: There were many students in the library yesterday.

tip.en: Use 'there were' for plural countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos contables en plural en el pasado.

prompt.es: No había agua caliente en el hotel.

exercises.solution: There wasn't any hot water in the hotel.

tip.en: Use 'there wasn't' for uncountable nouns in negative.
tip.es: Usa 'there wasn't' para sustantivos incontables en negativo.

prompt.es: Había un accidente en la autopista.

exercises.solution: There was an accident on the motorway.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for singular countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos contables en singular en el pasado.

prompt.es: No había autobuses funcionando durante la huelga.

exercises.solution: There weren't any buses running during the strike.

tip.en: Use 'there weren't' for plural nouns in negative past.
tip.es: Usa 'there weren't' para sustantivos en plural en pasado negativo.

prompt.es: Había mucho tráfico en el centro esta mañana.

exercises.solution: There was a lot of traffic in the centre this morning.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for uncountable nouns like traffic.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos incontables como tráfico.

prompt.es: Había cinco restaurantes en esa calle.

exercises.solution: There were five restaurants on that street.

tip.en: Use 'there were' for plural countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos contables en plural en el pasado.

prompt.es: No había electricidad en todo el barrio.

exercises.solution: There wasn't any electricity in the whole neighbourhood.

tip.en: Use 'there wasn't' for uncountable nouns in negative.
tip.es: Usa 'there wasn't' para sustantivos incontables en negativo.

prompt.es: Había una reunión importante ayer.

exercises.solution: There was an important meeting yesterday.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for singular countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos contables en singular en el pasado.

prompt.es: No había problemas con el sistema.

exercises.solution: There weren't any problems with the system.

tip.en: Use 'there weren't' for plural nouns in negative past.
tip.es: Usa 'there weren't' para sustantivos en plural en pasado negativo.

exercises.solution: There was smoke coming from the building.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for uncountable nouns like smoke.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos incontables como humo.

exercises.solution: There were hundreds of people at the concert.

tip.en: Use 'there were' for plural countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos contables en plural en el pasado.

prompt.es: No había tiempo suficiente para terminar.

exercises.solution: There wasn't enough time to finish.

tip.en: Use 'there wasn't' for uncountable nouns in negative.
tip.es: Usa 'there wasn't' para sustantivos incontables en negativo.

prompt.es: Había un error en la factura.

exercises.solution: There was a mistake on the bill.

tip.en: Use 'there was' for singular countable nouns in the past.
tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos contables en singular en el pasado.

exercises.solution: There weren't any shops open on Sunday.

tip.en: Use 'there weren't' for plural nouns in negative past.
tip.es: Usa 'there weren't' para sustantivos en plural en pasado negativo.

tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos incontables como arena.

tip.es: Usa 'there were' para sustantivos contables en plural en el pasado.

exercises.solution: There wasn't any milk in the fridge.

tip.es: Usa 'there wasn't' para sustantivos incontables en negativo.

tip.es: Usa 'there was' para sustantivos contables en singular en el pasado.

exercises.solution: There wasn't any heating in the building.
